input_text:
Job Title: Commercial Loan Processor

Location: Waynesboro, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Finance

Description:
We are looking to hire a Commercial Loan Processor who will be based out of Waynesboro, Virginia.
DuPont Community Credit Union (DCCU) is currently seeking qualified candidates for a Commercial Loan Processor in Waynesboro, VA. This role is a processing position responsible for assisting in all commercial loan administration functions.
Job Responsibilities:Ensure that new loan originations are accurately closed, funded, and that all loan information in the core system is complete and accurate.Provide support to ensure a high-quality commercial loan portfolio by: assisting in preparing new loans for closing and ensuring that the existing portfolio is properly serviced/maintained.Serve as the primary point of contact for commercial loan servicing questions; and obtain, review and clear conditions for new loan requests.Maintain reports for annual reviews, and monitor loan maturity tracking.Assist with letters of credit and ensure the accurate reporting of HMDA in accordance with regulations.Monitor follow up recommendations specific to loan annual reviews.
What Youâ€™ll Bring to the TableHigh school diploma or equivalent and 1-2 years of commercial lending/processing experience.Candidates with experience in Consumer Mortgage processing are also encouraged to apply.High degree for attention to detail and excellent communication skills.Excellent internal and external member service.The ability to manage a fast-paced work environment.
What We Bring to the TableMeaningful work that is highly impactful to the membership and community.A supportive work environment that values creativity and innovation.Dedicated development plan to support role success.Opportunities for development and career growth.Access to a competitive salary and benefits, including health insurance and retirement plans.Support of work-life balance.Community involvement opportunities.

Who We AreFounded in 1959, DCCU is a financial leader in the Shenandoah Valley, currently serving over 117,000 members, with over $1.7 Billion in Assets. At DCCU, we go beyond transactions and truly want to help our members achieve financial success by aligning them with the right products and services to help make a difference in their lives. This is a great opportunity to join a well-respected and growing financial institution offering meaningful work that impacts our community.
At DuPont Community Credit Union our goal is to be a diverse workforce that is representative, at all job levels, of the community we serve. We are an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants are encouraged to apply and will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Commercial Loan Processor
output_json.summary: DuPont Community Credit Union seeks a Commercial Loan Processor in Waynesboro, VA.
job_responsibilities: Assist in all commercial loan administration functions
Ensure accurate closure, funding, and completeness of loan information
Support high-quality commercial loan portfolio management
Serve as primary contact for commercial loan servicing questions
Prepare new loans for closing and maintain existing portfolio
Assist with letters of credit and HMDA reporting
Monitor follow-up recommendations for annual reviews
output_json.company_information: DuPont Community Credit Union, founded in 1959, serves over 117,000 members with $1.7 billion in assets.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: DuPont Community Credit Union is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer.
